events.name: AFTERWORK BUILDING
events.description: Having trouble finding your way around the buildings? Don't panic, this int√© tradition will help you see things more clearly (but no less blurry)!

events.name: ABC PARTY
events.description: Meet us at the MDE for this first integration tonus! The rules are simple: pick a costume that starts with the first letter of your first name. You can try to guess and remember everyone else's name!
